settings.content: Check out ImageKit's [ImageKit.io and Shopify integration](https://docs.imagekit.io/imagekit-docs/shopify) to learn more about this.

settings.label: ImageKit url endpoint
settings.info: The url endpoint you set within ImageKit. Example: `https://ik.imagekit.io/your_imagekit_id/`.

settings.label: Shopify CDN domain
settings.info: Do not change this unless you have a proxy in place. Not sure? Leave it as is.
